import React,{useState} from 'react' const Contact = () => { const [data, setdata] = useState({ fullname:'', Phone:'', email:'', msg:'', }) const InputEvent=(event)=>{ const {name,value}=event.target; setdata((prevval)=>{ return { ...prevval, [name]:value, } }) } const formSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDeafault(); alert(`my name is ${data.fullname}`) } return ( <>

Contact US

) } export default Contact
